colorPalette

Class ColorPaletteReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • colorPalette.ColorPaletteReader

  • public class ColorPaletteReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads a file that contains one hex color in every line and store into an ArrayList.
     读取一个在每行中包含一个十六进制颜色的文件，并存储到一个ArrayList中

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ColorPaletteReader(java.lang.String path)
      Reads a file that contains one hex color in every line and store into an ArrayList<Integer>.
      format: #123456, 0x000fff       读取一个在每行中包含一个十六进制颜色的文件，并存储到一个ArrayList<Integer>中
      格式：＃123456，0x000fff
